DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate metabolism route extent elimination telotristat etiprate primary metabolite LX1033 .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-label Study Evaluate Absorption , Metabolism , Excretion 14C-Telotristat Etiprate Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 30 65 year age . Male subject partner must agree use adequate method contraception Historically able produce minimum 1 bowel movement every day day Female subject Use medication supplement within 5 day prior Dosing Radiation exposure exceed 5 millisieverts ( mSv ) last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year Current smoker use cigarette within 90 day prior Screening History renal disease abnormal kidney function History hepatic disease Acute diarrhea constipation within 7 day dose Positive urine glucose Screening
